# Agents Plugin Documentation
> Public technical docs for the klick/agents Craft CMS plugin.

site: https://example.com/docs/agents/
summary: API, configuration, security, webhooks, CLI, and CP operations docs for integrators and LLM consumers.

## Key docs
- Home: /docs/agents/
- Get Started: /docs/agents/get-started/
- API Overview: /docs/agents/api/
- API Endpoints: /docs/agents/api/endpoints
- Auth and Scopes: /docs/agents/api/auth-and-scopes
- Incremental Sync: /docs/agents/api/incremental-sync
- Discovery Files: /docs/agents/discovery/
- Control Panel Cockpit: /docs/agents/cp/
- Security Overview: /docs/agents/security/
- Deployment Checklist: /docs/agents/security/deployment-checklist
- Webhooks: /docs/agents/webhooks/
- CLI Commands: /docs/agents/cli/
- Troubleshooting: /docs/agents/troubleshooting/
- Changelog: /docs/agents/changelog/
- Roadmap: /docs/agents/roadmap/

## Machine-readable references
- Docs index JSON: /docs/agents/docs-index.json
- Sitemap: /docs/agents/sitemap.xml
